div.p: Cascade Elementary School and Cascade Jr-Sr High School want to welcome you to a new school year and a brand new web space for the Cascade community.

Cascade Elementary School and Cascade Jr-Sr High School replaces its decade-old website with a new web and eLearning platform that will bring our schools, students and teachers to forefront of the 21st century.

p.strong: Cascade Elementary School and Cascade Jr-Sr High School, where “Success, Success, Success!” is the backbone of our learning approach!
